info.author: Dylan Knuth
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Lesser General Public License v3 (LGPLv3)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Midi Abstraction Layer and toolkit
-------------------------------------
CURRENTLY UNDER Development
NOT YET USABLE!
Can be used to save and load sysex files, as well as more interesting functions such
as patch interpolation, message conversion, parameter modulation, etc.

I recommend you use Python 2.7 x86 (there are good platform-agnostic python midi modules available on 2.7 x86)
You may have issues with x64, but I've warned you...
info.name: midikit
info.summary: Midi abstraction layer for audio devices
info.html_description:
CURRENTLY UNDER Development NOT YET USABLE! Can be used to save and load sysex files, as well as more interesting functions such as patch interpolation, message conversion, parameter modulation, etc.

I recommend you use Python 2.7 x86 (there are good platform-agnostic python midi modules available on 2.7 x86) You may have issues with x64, but I’ve warned you…
